channel.title: Oh God, please help me. *You'll get a cookie.*
channel.description:
Note *You won't actually get a cookie.*
Hi.
I run a dodian based server. I've severely editted it. It's worked fine, and it still works fine. But I want more.
As you may know, Dodian doesn't have moreinfo files, or any easy way to save into the char file. Basically, you can't really have a ::giveadmin command, or a ::starter command with some edits.
This is what I've been doing. I made a moreinfo folder for characters, which will save starter info, admin info, etc.
I don't exactly know how to do this. I'm not the greatest coder.
I've made it save into a moreinfo file, but I can't get it to load the moreinfo file. So it's useless. I'll give you the error in a second.
'client.java:17202: cannot find symbol symbol : class File location: class client "File myfile1 = new File("./moreinfo/" + playerName + ".txt"); ^ client.java:17202: cannot find symbol symbol : class File location: class client "File myfile1 = new File("./moreinfo/" + playerName + ".txt"); ^ '
Then it does teh same thing, only difference is its one line down, and its 'myfile2' instead of myfile1. I'm stumped. Be nice on me, I'ma noob.
Thanks fer yer help.

item.title: Oh God, please help me. *You'll get a cookie.*
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

Try this:

BufferedWriter moreinfofile = null; try { moreinfofile = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./moreinfo/" + playerName + ".txt"));

Note: You might have to change this, I’m not sure what methods devolution/dodian uses.

Read full topic
item.source: Oh God, please help me. *You'll get a cookie.*

Fuck I have to go. I’ll be back in the morning asking the same question.

Read full topic

item.title: Oh God, please help me. *You'll get a cookie.*
item.dc:creator: @Yeckar Yeckar
item.description:
@Yeckar wrote:

Note You won’t actually get a cookie.

Hi.

I run a dodian based server. I’ve severely editted it. It’s worked fine, and it still works fine. But I want more.

As you may know, Dodian doesn’t have moreinfo files, or any easy way to save into the char file. Basically, you can’t really have a ::giveadmin command, or a ::starter command with some edits.

This is what I’ve been doing. I made a moreinfo folder for characters, which will save starter info, admin info, etc.

I don’t exactly know how to do this.
I’m not the greatest coder.

I’ve made it save into a moreinfo file, but I can’t get it to load the moreinfo file. So it’s useless. I’ll give you the error in a second.

'client.java:17202: cannot find symbol
symbol : class File
location: class client
“File myfile1 = new File(”./moreinfo/" + playerName + “.txt”);
^
client.java:17202: cannot find symbol
symbol : class File
location: class client
“File myfile1 = new File(”./moreinfo/" + playerName + “.txt”);
^
’

Then it does teh same thing, only difference is its one line down, and its ‘myfile2’ instead of myfile1. I’m stumped. Be nice on me, I’ma noob.

Thanks fer yer help.
